definition: rutile (mineral form of titanium oxide TiO2)
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Iron and zinc doping can lower the transformation temperature of anatase to rutile.
sentences.chinese: 铁及锌的掺杂会降低锐钛晶向金红石的转变温度。

sentences.english: Rutile is a common Ti-bearing accessory mineral in eclogites.
sentences.chinese: 金红石是榴辉岩中的主要含钛副矿物。

sentences.english: The paper introduces the processing experimental research of a eclogite-type rutile mine.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了某榴辉岩型金红石矿石的选矿试验研究。

sentences.english: The rutile Ti-O film has the similar blood compatibility compared with the low temperature isotropic pyrolytic carbon.
sentences.chinese: 金红石型氧化钛薄膜具有与热解碳相当的血液相容性。

sentences.english: Several kinds of preparing processes of the titania coated mica based nacreous pigment are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 制备出金红石型钛含量较高的云母钛珠光颜料。

sentences.english: The rutile deposits in china with different genesis types and different ore-control factors .
sentences.chinese: 中国金红石矿床成因类型不一，控矿因素各异。

sentences.english: The doping of Co, Ag, W can lower the transformation temperature of anatase to rutile.
sentences.chinese: 的掺杂会降低锐钛矿相向金红石相的转变温度。

sentences.english: Rutile exists as subhedral granular texture, and is mainly distributed between tremolite.
sentences.chinese: 金红石呈半自形粒状结构，多分布于透闪石矿物之间。

sentences.english: Anatase transformed into rutile at 500~700℃and all anatase transformed into rutile at 700℃.
sentences.chinese: 当温度上升到700℃，锐钛矿全部转变为金红石。

sentences.english: Similar results were measured for rutile films as well.
sentences.chinese: 金红石薄膜实验也得到了相似的结果。

sentences.english: This includes rutile needles that produce 3 and 6 rayed stars on the surface of the stones.
sentences.chinese: 这包括金红石针产生3日和6光检查星表面的石头。

sentences.english: Its chief commercial ores are ilmenite and rutile .
sentences.chinese: 有商业价值的主要矿石是钛铁矿和金红石。
